verses.verse: Now the Philistines<WH6430> fought<WH3898> against Israel:<WH3478> and the men<WH582> of Israel<WH3478> fled<WH5127> from before<WH6440> the Philistines,<WH6430> and fell down<WH5307> slain<WH2491> on Mount<WH2022> Gilboa.<WH1533>

The battle<WH4421> went hard<WH3513> against Saul,<WH7586> and the archers<WH582> overtook<WH4672> him;<WH3966> and he was greatly distressed<WH2342> by reason of the archers.<WH582>

Then Saul<WH7586> said<WH559> to his armor bearer,<WH5375> "Draw<WH8025> your sword,<WH2719> and thrust me through<WH1856> with it,<WH6189> lest these uncircumcised come<WH935> and thrust me through,<WH1856> and abuse<WH5953> me!<WH5375>" But his armor bearer would<WH14> not;<WH3966> for he was terrified.<WH3372> Therefore Saul<WH7586> took<WH3947> his sword,<WH2719> and fell on it.<WH5307>
When his armor bearer<WH5375> saw<WH7200> that Saul<WH7586> was dead,<WH4191> he likewise fell<WH5307> on his sword,<WH2719> and died with him.<WH4191>
So Saul<WH7586> died,<WH4191> and his three<WH7969> sons,<WH1121> and his armor bearer,<WH5375> and all his men,<WH582> that same day<WH3117> together.<WH3162>

When the men<WH582> of Israel<WH3478> who were on the other side<WH5676> of the valley,<WH6010> and those who were beyond<WH5676> the Jordan,<WH3383> saw<WH7200> that the men<WH582> of Israel<WH3478> fled,<WH5127> and that Saul<WH7586> and his sons<WH1121> were dead,<WH4191> they forsook<WH5800> the cities,<WH5892> and fled;<WH5127> and the Philistines<WH6430> came<WH935> and lived in them.<WH3427>

It happened on the next day,<WH4283> when the Philistines<WH6430> came<WH935> to strip<WH6584> the slain,<WH2491> that they found<WH4672> Saul<WH7586> and his three<WH7969> sons<WH1121> fallen<WH5307> on Mount<WH2022> Gilboa.<WH1533>

They cut off<WH3772> his head,<WH7218> and stripped off<WH3772> his armor,<WH3627> and sent<WH7971> into the land<WH776> of the Philistines<WH6430> all around,<WH5439> to carry the news<WH1319> to the house<WH1004> of their idols,<WH6091> and to the people.<WH5971>
They put<WH7760> his armor<WH3627> in the house<WH1004> of the Ashtaroth;<WH6252> and they fastened<WH8628> his body<WH1472> to the wall<WH2346> of Beth Shan.<WH1052>
When the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jabesh Gilead<WH3003> heard<WH8085> concerning him that which the Philistines<WH6430> had done<WH6213> to Saul,<WH7586>

all the valiant<WH2428> men<WH376> arose,<WH6965> and went<WH3212> all night,<WH3915> and took<WH3947> the body<WH1472> of Saul<WH7586> and the bodies<WH1472> of his sons<WH1121> from the wall<WH2346> of Beth Shan;<WH1052> and they came<WH935> to Jabesh,<WH3003> and burnt them there.<WH8313>
